name: Rasenmon Fury Mode
effect: [End of Attack] You may digivolve this Digimon into a [Rasenmon] in your hand, ignoring its digivolution requirements and without paying its digivolution cost.[End of Your Turn] Trash the top card of your security stack.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] When this card is trashed as a digivolution card by [Rasenmon]'s effect, unsuspend 1 of your Digimon and it gets +3000 DP for the turn.
